attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To celebrate the new legal year we would like the Government to take action against the continuing illegal detention of detainees around the world, who have no legal or human rights at present.  Join us and hold one of the 226 placards to show your solidarity for the detainees of Guantanamo Bay on 3rd October at Parliament Square 1pm. 

And let's try and Stop the Spread of Guantanamitis. Details are on the Amnesty website under events.
